title: Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program via Problem-Based Learning (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts (Equations, Functions, Statistics) and Problem-Solving Experience
context.additional_context: Program focused on enhancing real-life problem-solving skills aligned with vocational institutions' mathematics curriculum, using both lab facilities and online platforms

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex math problems using problem-based learning (PBL) methods and propose solutions with 80% accuracy.
Learners can reduce cognitive load for similar problem types by 30% through worked example analysis.
Learners can develop an error correction plan based on formative assessment feedback and demonstrate over 90% implementation feasibility.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
